---
title: "Gantt Charts"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(timevis)
```

Data
```{r}
data <- data.frame(
  id      = 1:4,
  content = c("Item one"  , "Item two"  ,"Ranged item", "Item four"),
  start   = c("2019-05-01", "2019-06-01", "2019-07-20", "2019-08-14 15:00:00"),
  end     = c(NA          ,           NA, "2019-08-13", NA)
)
```

```{r}
timevis(data)
```
